sources.title: Trapped Alive(1988)
sources.description: Several escaped prisoners and two hostage women along with a sheriff's deputy find themselves trapped in a mine shaft, where a cannibalistic mutant is hunting them for food.

metadata.Plot: On a snowy Christmas night, three convicts break outta prison n they carjack taking two women as hostages but things turn ugly when the car plummets down a mine shaft, trapping all the five fellas down. Well, like they say outta the frying pan into the fire.
metadata.Actors: Jay Leggett, Cameron Mitchell, Sullivan Hester
